metadata.title: CVE-2024-35326 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: libyaml v0.2.5 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow. Affected by this issue isthe function yaml_emitter_emit of the file /src/libyaml/src/emitter.c. Themanipulation leads to a double-free.

criterions.comment: libyaml package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-19').
libyaml-libyaml-perl package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-19').
golang-yaml.v2 package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-19').
